Title: He Nü'er De Richang
Description:
['A father with lots of love is often tormented endlessly by his daughter in everyday life. But this father would often look on all the troubles created by this child with a warm and loving heart. This is the super healing and cute series about the daily life of this father and daughter, it’s warm loving and interesting too.', '
